amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce total funding in the bill by 1% across the board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce total funding in the bill by 1% across the board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 251 (Roll no. 221).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
